name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Marlon Anthony SCOTT, Appellee; Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. George Brown, a/k/a Keith Jones, Appellee

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Marlon Anthony SCOTT, Appellee. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. George Brown, a/k/a Keith Jones, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeals dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Samuel R. Zuck, Esq., Mercer, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.

casebody.head_matter:
859 A.2d 471
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Marlon Anthony SCOTT, Appellee. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. George Brown, a/k/a Keith Jones, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted and Argued Sept. 20, 2004.
Decided Oct. 7, 2004.
Samuel R. Zuck, Esq., Mercer, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Marlon Anthony Scott, for Marlon Anthony Scott.
Randall Thomas Hetrick, Esq., for George Brown.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
